product.title: My Robot Home Compact
product.short_description: AM ROBOTS’s famous Highline garage in a smaller and compact version for all medium and small-size robots.
product.long_description: AM ROBOTS’s famous Highline garage in a smaller and compact version for all medium and small-size robots. The door runs with a mechanical function and doesn’t demand a timer or electrical installation. MY ROBOT HOME COMPACT comes with a Name tag, solar Light, windows and doors with white panels to give it a high-class look. The garage protects the robot and prolongs its lifespan of the robot by several years.

chunks.heading: Overview
chunks.text: AM ROBOTS’s famous Highline garage in a smaller and compact version for all medium and small-size robots.

chunks.heading: Description
chunks.text: AM ROBOTS’s famous Highline garage in a smaller and compact version for all medium and small-size robots. The door runs with a mechanical function and doesn’t demand a timer or electrical installation. MY ROBOT HOME COMPACT comes with a Name tag, solar Light, windows and doors with white panels to give it a high-class look. The garage protects the robot and prolongs its lifespan of the robot by several years.

chunks.heading: Features
chunks.text: Features: Solar Light, RTK-Ready, Fits Medium and Small robot mowers, A mechanical door that opens and closes automatically, Fast-growing wood, 2-Year warranty, Protects the robot all year, Access to the robot from the top, Size of the garage: 76cm x 86cm x 52,5cm, Size of the garage door: 55cm x 31cm
